books.author: by Bob Woodward
books.description: Based on hours of interviews with sources, the Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist describes debates and decision-making within the Trump White House.
books.name: FEAR

books.author: by Sally Field
books.description: A memoir by the two-time Academy Award and three-time Emmy Award winner.
books.name: IN PIECES

books.author: by Doris Kearns Goodwin
books.description: The challenges that shaped the leadership abilities of four presidents: Abraham Lincoln, Theodore Roosevelt, Franklin D. Roosevelt and Lyndon B. Johnson.
books.name: LEADERSHIP

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by Jill Lepore
books.description: An investigation of truth in America traced through its intertwining histories of politics, law, technology and journalism.
books.name: THESE TRUTHS

books.author: by Jason Chaffetz
books.description: The former Republican congressman alleges that parts of the federal bureaucracy try to undermine President Trump.
books.name: THE DEEP STATE

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: Technological, political and social issues in the modern era, and the choices individuals might consider in facing them.
books.name: 21 LESSONS FOR THE 21ST CENTURY

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by Gregg Jarrett
books.description: The Fox News analyst makes his case against the F.B.I. investigation into collusion between the Trump campaign and Russia.
books.name: THE RUSSIA HOAX

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by Ben Macintyre
books.description: The story of Oleg Gordievsky, a K.G.B. spy who secretly worked for the British intelligence service, and Aldrich Ames, a C.I.A. officer who was a K.G.B. double agent.
books.name: THE SPY AND THE TRAITOR

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson and Avis Lang
books.description: Observations of the two-way relationship between science and military power.
books.name: ACCESSORY TO WAR

books.author: by Sarah Smarsh
books.description: The author, who was born into a family of Kansas wheat farmers and teenage mothers, uses her personal history to explore the difficulties faced by the working class in America.
books.name: HEARTLAND

books.author: by Glenn Beck
books.description: The conservative commentator encourages self-reflection and personal responsibility by Americans across the political spectrum.
books.name: ADDICTED TO OUTRAGE

books.author: by Tom Wright and Bradley Hope
books.description: How Jho Low siphoned off an investment fund to finance elections, buy luxury real estate and produce Hollywood films on the heels of the 2008 financial crisis.
books.name: BILLION DOLLAR WHALE
